articles.author: Tyrell Feaster
articles.title: Michael Jordan's 1998 NBA Finals Air Jordan 13s become the most valuable sneakers sold of ALL-TIME - Daily Mail
articles.description: The pair of Air Jordan XIII's were worn by the basketball legend during the 1998 NBA Finals and broke the record previously set by a pair of Nike Air Yeezy 1 prototypes.
articles.content:
A pair of game worn and autographed shoes by Michael Jordan has sold for a record-breaking $2.2million at auction.
